text:
I added Slide.getTitle() which returns title of a slide. 

Title is a text run of type TextHeaderAtom.CENTER_TITLE_TYPE or
TextHeaderAtom.TITLE_TYPE. With this method it is easier to write testcases to
control the order of slides. Just follow the pattern in
TestSlideOrdering.testTitles() if you have more files to test.

Yegor
creator: yegor@dinom.ru
yegor@dinom.ru
